description:
Running openstack stable/icehouse
Tried booting a VM after the volumes quota is full
Nova throws a 400 Bad Request.
If Nova gets a Quota error from any of the services it should throw 413 Forbidden instead of a 400 Bad Request.
This is for nova boot by volume option
title: Nova throws 400 in the fault for Quota issues
